name: Beat the System
description:
Beat the System is an RTS-FPS hybrid, where you must capture all of the bases in this digital realm to beat the system!

You have a grappling hook and the ability to take control of your units on the battlefield, being able to switch to a top-down point of view at will to command your fireteams and build more turrets using resources collected from fallen enemies. You have to use your wits and strategic positioning to capture the enemy command posts to win.

Controls

Switch Viewmode - Tab

Move - WASD

Look - Mouse Cursor Position

Pause - Esc

Top Down View:

    Select Units - LMB

    Set Unit Destination - RMB

First Person View:

    Jump - Space

    Fire Grapple - RMB

    Loosen/Tighten Grapple - Q/E

    Pick Up / Down Turret - F or LMB
